hello: Hello! I'm a bot to get GitHub information, type 'help' to get some assistance.
sorry: Sorry, I did not understand '%s'. Type 'help' if you need assistance.

repository_info_welcome: Welcome to the Repository Infomation finder! We are analyzing your message: '%s'.
